title: Star Trek 4
description: The fourth volume of Star Trek: The Original Series episode novelizations. Includes the following stories: "All Our Yesterdays," "The Devil In The Dark," "Journey To Babel," "The Menagerie," "The Enterprise Incident," and "A Piece Of The Action."(from the book jacket)SIX ASSIGNMENTS IN SPACE AND TIMEIn the name of the Federation Council and the Starfleet Command, Spock and the Enterprise crew grapple with:- A Silicon-Based Monster- An Interplanetary Spy- An Amorous Amazon- A Misguided Mobster "Boss"- A Time-Jumping Technician- And the Mind-Enslaving Elders of Talos IV, in the "Hugo" Award-Winning Episode "Menagerie."
author: James Blish
